Text:
_____padding_file_0_if you see this file, please update to BitComet 0.85 or above____ 

There is 3 files like this among other files, what should I do to them? For now I just copied other files from this ZIP to my GTA directory, nothing happened... How does this work?
Useless crack. You still need RSSC to open the game + it adds a retarded Rzr1911 logo and music playing at 100% volume every time you open the game.
Oh and apparently the game doesn't even work even if you install RGSC. Keep away!
